snippet: Shares of Walmart Stores bucked the trend after the company reported surprisingly strong sales and released an optimistic outlook.
abstract: Stocks slide as investors prepare for possible June interest rate increases by Federal Reserve.
lead_paragraph: Shares of Walmart Stores bucked the trend after the company reported surprisingly strong sales and released an optimistic outlook.

headline.main: Wall St. Slumps as Investors Gird for Rate Increase
headline.print_headline: Wall St. Slumps as Investors Gird for Rate Increase
